sbp.client.drivers.base_driver module¶

class sbp.client.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver(handle)[source]¶

Bases: object

The BaseDriver class wraps IO sources of SBP messages and provides context management.

handle : port
Stream of bytes to read from and write to.
close()[source]¶

Close wrapper.

flush()[source]¶

Flush wrapper.

read(size)[source]¶

Read wrapper.

size : int
Number of bytes to read.
write(s)[source]¶

Write wrapper.

s : bytes
Bytes to write
